PageTitle: display bgp evpn all routing-table statistics
FuncDef: The display bgp evpn all routing-table statistics command displays statistics information about all of BGP EVPN routes.
CLIs: display bgp evpn all routing-table statistics
Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp evpn all routing-table statistics
Total number of routes from all PE: 6
Number of IGMP Join Synch Routes: 0
Number of IGMP Leave Synch Routes: 0
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check statistics information about BGP EVPN routes of all instances for maintenance, run the display bgp evpn all routing-table statistics command.
